text: Hariho abubatse isengero ry’urwankano n’ugushigikira ubuhakanyi bw’Imana, hamwe n’ugutandukanya abemeye Imana yabo y’ukuri n’ukugira aho hantu habe ari aho kurorerera bamwe batera ingwano Imana hamwe n’intumwa yayo aho hambere hahise, ntankeka bazorahira bavuga bati:- ntanabi twashaka atari ineza gusa, mugabo Imana niyo cabona yuko aribo babeshi
